directions: Cook peppers, onions and garlic in dressing in 10-inch ovenproof skillet on medium heat 5 min., stirring frequently. Add potatoes; cook 5 min., stirring frequently. Remove from heat. Spread potato mixture to evenly cover bottom of skillet; top with ham.
Whisk eggs and milk until blended; pour over ham. Top with VELVEETA.
Bake 30 min. or until center is set. Sprinkle with cilantro.
ingredients: 1 pound red potatoes, cooked, finely chopped
1 (6 ounce) package OSCAR MAYER Smoked Ham, chopped
title: Spanish Omelet
